remarks: Properties of the minimal polynomial of an algebraic number. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.)
statement: mpaalem $p |- ( A e. AA -> ( ( minPolyAA ` A ) e. ( Poly ` QQ ) /\ ( ( deg ` ( minPolyAA ` A ) ) = ( degAA ` A ) /\ ( ( minPolyAA ` A ) ` A ) = 0 /\ ( ( coeff ` ( minPolyAA ` A ) ) ` ( degAA ` A ) ) = 1 ) ) ) $.
